entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Alliston

entry.title: Monday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then light this afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
